website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable way to test for mold in your home, but keep in mind lab results are an extra cost.
pros: Includes everything you need to swab your home to test for mold
Get results verified by a lab for specifics
cons: Some buyers received kits without the mold medium

customer_reviews.title: Great Test & Easy To Use!
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use. Make sure to read all the directions. If you want to know what type of mold is in your house you can send it off to the lab or you could just look up the color on the Internet. :) Some are more dangerous than others. If we had any dangerous looking ones we were going to have them tested. All of our tests though were negative. We have a child with asthma so we were trying to see if mold was an issue in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: False advertising! Product description did not inform that 2 kits are required AND there's a fee for processing.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The results are a scam...report said they couldn't test the sample but still charged the $40.00
customer_reviews.author: pwaggs

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I paid the $40 for the lab test and never received a result. When you call them all you can do is leave a message.
customer_reviews.author: L Frank

customer_reviews.title: little deceiving in that you really have to pay $40 ...
customer_reviews.text: little deceiving in that you really have to pay $40 to find out what mold you have. almost everyone has some mold
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Burton

customer_reviews.title: not DIY. also, had to pay extra $40 fee
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 ways you can test. the first 2 are DIY. The 3rd requires you to send it in to a lab for analysis, which sets you back $40 & up to 3 weeks for analysis. I needed the answers ASAP for legal reasons. I was not prepared for either the extra fee or waiting...
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for a 3 year old to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for a 3 year old to use. Follow the instructions. Wait the specified amount of time and one will have their answer as to whether or not mold is lurking in your house. I used it to help a friend in a bad apartment / landlord situation. It was amazing how much her situation improved with the positive results from this test. Thanks Mold Armor.
customer_reviews.author: WAHJR

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if these are working! :(
customer_reviews.text: So I've used these in the past with much success. There's nearly always SOMETHING lurking in your home especially if you have an old place. I bought two of these in a row thinking maybe I messed up on the first one - but neither of them have had anything grow on them AT ALL. I don't know if maybe these ones are old or what the deal is but it's very strange to not have a single thing grow on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: You have to send them $40+ to actually test the mold
customer_reviews.author: xxxHello^.^xxx

customer_reviews.title: not much use if you can't see the mold
customer_reviews.text: The test reported that there was evidence of four kinds of mold. Turns out that all four are found in and common to virtually every encloused space. And the only piece of data that will tell you anything of value is whether one or another of the four is present in very large quantities. The mold test does not tell you that. So if you can't see the mold but smell something, this test is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Worked very reliably for me
customer_reviews.text: These worked very reliably for me. I purchased two kits. I tested two different HVAC systems exactly as directed. Neither mold kit showed any results after 24 or 48h. Then after 72h one of them (the one on the right in my photo) started showing a little mold but the other nothing. I waited 2 more days, and again nothing on one, and a little more growth on the first. The picture is after two weeks. I would say based on these results that the kit worked exactly as designed. I did NOT send them in to the lab for results. I suspected one of my HVAC systems might have mold, so I'm simply having it cleaned by the pros.
customer_reviews.author: JonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: After some flooding in the apartment, mold grew and I wanted to make sure it wasn't any harmful type of mold. I got this kit since it had an optional lab testing for $40. It was very easy to follow instructions and you kind of feel like you're in HS science class again. The kit's a bit more basic but it does the job. I swabbed some of the mold and rubbed in on there. Taped it up and sent it out. Two weeks later, I got an email with the results, and the mold types were not dangerous. Not terribly expensive for peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: vh7

customer_reviews.title: SCAM!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a SCAM! The product itself was easy to use, but once I sent off the samples and paid the additional fee for testing, I never heard from the company again. I emailed them over and over for the past few months and no response. They will take your money and never send you testing results. Do NOT waste your time and money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brenten

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Results
customer_reviews.text: No sure about the accuracy on this thing- I ordered this because we had a stench on our bedroom. Mold grew on it within a couple of days and I mailed it in to discover what kind. Still waiting for that. In the meantime I got a company out here to detect wet material in the ground and walls and they found nothing. Maybe your better off having a trusted company come inspect for FREE, rather then pay for this. Questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seeing is believing
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Sometimes you just have to see if there is a problem to believe. This worked great. The rental smelled of mold. You pour the mixture into the dish. Wait an hour. Then leave the cover off for 1 hour. Recover and put in dark place. I didn't need to send it in for the rental people to see that there was a problem. Got the mold taken care of. Thank you for this kit.
customer_reviews.author: plp

customer_reviews.title: website is not available to register and get testing
customer_reviews.text: I used the product as directed. Nothing to show after 48 hours however after 60 hours mold was growing plentiful in several different colors, so I assume different types of air borne mold. I tried to go to the website to register and pay for testing and continue to get warnings that the site doesn't exist and is a danger to my computer if I go further. I have called the company WM Barr directly and am waiting for a call back as we speak
customer_reviews.author: MB Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading. Not a "test" kit. Just a petri dish.
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is misleading. It is not a test that you can send off to a lab to identify the mold - that costs an extra $40. Instead, this product is just a petri dish with some growth medium and a swab. This cost of something like this is around 99 cents. If you manage to grow mold (or something else), you'll have no idea unless you send it off to the lab for the extra $40 for analysis. Waste of time and money. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Never got results!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit. Did everything as directed. Created my account with Mold Armor and sent the kit away as we did have growth in the petri dish. 2 months later....Nothing. I contacted Mold Armor...Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: emily von stuckrad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works really well. I have used these in two different mold contaminated houses and they work perfectly. I suspected mold was present and this showed me there was mold. It was later confirmed when I found the source. This is the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL WATE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: TOTAL RIP OFF!!!! I sent in the dishes to be analyzed at $40 per dish and never received the results. I called the customer service number and the man that answered said I should have the result in my email in 15 mins. Never got them! $120 gone down the drain. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is a great test kit
customer_reviews.text: After 72 hours, mold started growing. This is a great test kit. So easy, despite the directions being so confusing. For the inside air testing, all you have to do is put the potato starch on the bottom and leave it for one hour Closed. Then open up the lid and let it sit for one hour. Then wait for mold to grow. I will ship this out for the $40 fee to get it tested to see what the heck is growing in my apartment. I will sue them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonnube

customer_reviews.title: Total Scam
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this kit. Completed according to instructions. Paid fee for analysis...nothing. I have written the company but have gotten no response back. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: deficient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 Mold Armor FG500 kits. ONE OF THE KITS DID NOT HAVE THE BOTTLE OF LIQUID IN IT. That was shoddy. Now I'm having a terrible time trying to just plain return it for a refund. Please let me know what to do. The Amazon web site is OF NO USE. Thanks, Joan Hinkley
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Purchased it did not realize after swabbing you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it did not realize after swabbing you have to send sample to lab plus $40.00 that is a ripp off.
customer_reviews.author: Jare_Bear1267

customer_reviews.title: Scam.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and mailed my sample after paying the $40.00 , It has been two months and I have not recieved any results nor have they responded to my emails. Will be reporting to bbb.
customer_reviews.author: jasman

customer_reviews.title: No reply after paying $80 for two test analyses
customer_reviews.text: I received the test kits as promised. Performed the test which resulted in clear mold growth. I took advantage of the testing service and ordered two tests, cost of $80, and sent in the mailer. No results returned ever. I emailed the company twice, and zero reply. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: MarkN

customer_reviews.title: Missed the return window
customer_reviews.text: Petri dish was broken so we couldn't even try it 😡
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We did grow some mold on an old baker's island. However, my cat decided he wanted to try the agar and jumped up on the baker's island. How do I know? Part of the agar had lick marks in it. Decided to treat the wood and retest in the future before I get rid of the island
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this test for my parents home. The directions were easy to follow and I was confident I had done it correctly. I then mailed it back according to their directions and expected to get results within 2 weeks. That was 6 months ago and still have not heard a word from them!!! Don’t waste your time and money!!!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY K

customer_reviews.title: Never got results
customer_reviews.text: I'll add myself to the list of those who never got results. You can call and leave a message or an e-mail. Don't expect a response
customer_reviews.author: kwixote

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use. Just be sure to check your Spam folder for your results.
customer_reviews.author: Copswife2011

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase the testing separately but everything was pretty straightforward. There is a paid envelope in there to send it. The results take a while to come back. Mine revealed common mold but it was good to see the different kinds and what they were from.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Gave me results
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for confirmation that there was mold coming out of my vents. It was easy to tape up to the vent. I didn't use the mail-in service for what type of mold, so I can't review that part of the service. I had a mold remediation company come in at that point and take over.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: NEED 2 KITS TO KINDA GET AN ACCURATE READING OF MOLD.
customer_reviews.text: This product explicitly says in the package that you need at least 2 kits to accurately determine if you have a mold problem. One for the suspected area but also one to compare with outside air quality. If this is the case, why not sell this kit with 2 petri dishes??? It's literally useless if i dont buy two Nd use at same time...DO NOT BUY FROM THESE THEFTS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Suspect this is a scam
customer_reviews.text: Submitted the sample and paid $40 on August 3. It is now September 19, and no results or communication have been received. I have attempted to contact the company twice. Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this is a scam.. they put some type of mold in the substance that they send you.
customer_reviews.text: All types of mold grew in the dish without me opening the dish up. The mold spores must have been in the liquid that they give you to pour into the petri dish. This is a scam, then they take $40 to tell you what type of molds there are... and the molds are not from my house, they are from their liquid substance. I had purchased two test kits, and left the other one out to try to duplicate the mold that the first dish grew... the second dish would not grow anything. Beware...
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Heart

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Information and Items
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this test yet, because when I opened the box and read the directions, I found that you actually have to order at least TWO of these kits in order to perform the test. If that is the case, they should just include two of everything in each kit! I will now have to wait to do the test until I order and receive a second kit. *Will update my rating after I complete the mold test
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Just want to say, you have to send this in for results, about $40 bucks a kit. they do respond very fast, by e-mail and snail mail, u can even call, read carefully.
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK186

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I mailed in the test like the instructions said. After, I went to the website that was instructed on the label, but it would not take me to my test results. When I emailed the company, I never got a response.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Skurka

customer_reviews.title: Do waist your money
customer_reviews.text: We did as the directions said and saw nothing, not even one spoor. Even though my son has mold on his wall.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHartman

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Although the actual test was easy to use, once you pay the additional cost for the lab analysis and send the product off for review, the company never actually sends a response.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gehrig

customer_reviews.title: No Response/Results
customer_reviews.text: Used our kit, returned for results several months ago - never received a response or results. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Julia Summers

customer_reviews.title: Might be a scam
customer_reviews.text: I think personally that its a scam but others seem to have results.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Paid this company 40 extra dollars to evaluate the spores from my kit and haven’t received results. The box says you get results within 10 days of receipt. 13 business days later and no results. They didn’t provide any sort of tracking number so I may be out $40 but I have no idea!
customer_reviews.author: gracedrawsstuff

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and then set it near VISIBLE mold for the hour like it said. NOTHING It's mold for sure I clean it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Toonces

customer_reviews.title: Put the work in. Youtube, whatever, better ways to investigate mold growth
customer_reviews.text: With a little research you can find agar agar and reusable petri dishes for a fraction of the cost at your neighborhood stores. Additionally no info on successful spore growth
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better description online
customer_reviews.text: Confusing exactly how this works. Apparently you need to buy two? Then there are extra steps involved? Anyhow, I'm sure it's useful and works once you figure it out, but the directions up front prior to purchase could be clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not sure but I think it works
customer_reviews.text: Well it grew mold and that was his job so it seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2- one for outside and one for inside. It was very easy to use. You just place the liquid and seal the Petri dish.
customer_reviews.author: LANCE

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t tell you anything unless you pay more
customer_reviews.text: These are a waste of money unless you really want to pay more to send it in and find out exactly what species of mold you have. If you have a real concern with mold in your hone get a professional to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The product did the job but after further research I found that the solution you use in the Petri dish Exaggerated the results so it looks like your environment has a much worse mold problem than there actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Galanti

customer_reviews.title: The mold finder
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were easy to follow. I purchased this for my apartment as I was worried about potential mold following a shotty ceiling repair from a roof leak.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nalesnik

customer_reviews.title: It is an easy way to begin solving an obvious issue
customer_reviews.text: This test kit (2) confirmed my suspicions in less than a week after being exposed to the air for only one hour each, then following instructions. It is an easy way to begin solving an obvious issue.
customer_reviews.author: JOG145

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Used to test my classroom! Found 17 different types of mold growing in my room. The maintenance people were able to get in and clean the room! No problems since!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but additional money required 😣
customer_reviews.text: I have a lower star rating because I was disappointed that the kit itself is so cheap, but didn’t know you had to mail it into a lab and pay an additional $40 to test what kind of mold it is!! Other than that, it was an easy kit to use and it at least let me know there’s mold in my work office. Just don’t know what kind now....sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Jamye

customer_reviews.title: Good news, bad news
customer_reviews.text: Guys news is that it works, easy to use, and very compact. Bad news is that I have mold :(
customer_reviews.author: Arseny M

customer_reviews.title: Moldy odor
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy didn't send away because mold is mold I don't care what kind
customer_reviews.author: Jae Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I have some leaks in my house , a few of them and I really wanted to show my landlord we do in fact have Mold in the house, he wasnt going to call anybody out so I got this. The Instructions were clear and the same type of mold I've been seeing in my house is what grew in the dish
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this to test my house this is great, Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Farideh G

customer_reviews.title: Nothing grew for days
customer_reviews.text: Then penicillin fungus grew which I couldn't figure out because I am doubtful it naturally occurs in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Americankiwi

customer_reviews.title: Mold is Mold
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it supposed to. A little misleading because you have to pay $50 to find out what type of mold it is.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. It showed a mold problem. Had to pay $40.00 for private lab testing. Still waiting for the results.
customer_reviews.author: Big Lar

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work. Did not detect mold so that’s a good thing.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to assess whether there is mold present. Very easy to use, and easy way to assess risk. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Nice home test
customer_reviews.text: Used it, showed no mold, so fingers crossed everything worked as described!

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Kits like this are hard to find. Worth the money. Easy to use..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE. STILL WAITING FOR RESULTS ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE THIS SERVICE. STILL WAITING FOR RESULTS. THERE ARE OTHER REPUTABLE TESTING LABS AVAILABLE.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Have to pay 40$ to get a test result that doesn't mean much.

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you follow directions!
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely works. Didn't send for testing. Just wanted to see if we had mold in our heating ducts. And we do. Now we know.
customer_reviews.author: ann huffman

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use as long as you follow the easy instructions!

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use however I did not want to spend the extra money to have it tested.

customer_reviews.title: Only one test inside!!
customer_reviews.text: Only one test inside! Description made it seem like 3 were included :( Prefer not to put any stars at all!
customer_reviews.author: aMazonshopping12

customer_reviews.title: Bad product but great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Test are unfortunately not as accurate as I think. Costumer service is phenomenal though!
customer_reviews.author: Imani S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing the mold growth medium upon delivery and I know ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing the mold growth medium upon delivery and I know I'm not the only one this has happened to Fix this or get rid of the product
customer_reviews.author: Derek Z.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without liquid to conduct test
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 tests to conduct in different areas in my home. Two of the tests arrived complete and one came without the liquid! The two were easy and inexpensive to use, but now I have to wait to test the second floor of our home.
customer_reviews.author: eric roering

customer_reviews.title: My mind is at ease
customer_reviews.text: All three of the kits I bought are easy to use and give piece of mind results.

customer_reviews.title: efficient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product was very easy to use. Instructions were perfect and when I called customer service for a quick question they picked up and was very courteous.

customer_reviews.title: Great mold detection
customer_reviews.text: Great mold detection. Where they get you is the lab fee.

customer_reviews.title: if you have mold
customer_reviews.text: it showed mold, but to test and mail it for additional $40. was too much

customer_reviews.text: Super easy to find out if you have mold. However, it will cost an additional $40.00 to find out what kind of mold. Useless and wish I could get a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Worked like a charm. Easy to use and we sent the dish in to find out exactly what kind of mold it is for the extra $40 cost.

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived completely broken and the entire petri dish was shattered.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked

customer_reviews.text: There was supposed to be three plates but only one was delivered.

customer_reviews.title: Fake product?
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing against the product. I think I received a fake product

customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer can not be located to do lab test ??

customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Was able to tell my house after my house flooding. Easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Missing solution
customer_reviews.text: Second kit I received without the solution! This product is clearly useless without the solution! Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: One of the mold kits were missing the bottle of liquid you pour in the dish— very unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Have used 4 Mold Test Kits Does The Job!!

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: Basic test, didn't produce results at home which I suppose is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Expect to spend the extra $40
customer_reviews.text: I simply wanted to know if I have green or black mold. The kit told me nothing at all. I wasn't about to throw away another $40. It just seemed like a scam. Threw away 8 bucks - but not 48.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wright

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS. There's no other way to put ...
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS. There's no other way to put it. Instructions say that you can get lab analysis just follow the listed link. That link only goes to the company's website which has no link to for purchasing the lab analysis. I emailed them and got no response. So, I need a lab analysis with no way to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: I bought 7 of these and tested our house for mold. Remember to by one for outdoors for a comparison to the mold outside.
customer_reviews.author: spartonx

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the product. It was lost in transit. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the product. It was lost in transit. Finally received it and it was missing the growth solution in the sealed box.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Garncarz

customer_reviews.title: It's mold, but what kind?
customer_reviews.text: The Mold Armor Mold Test Kit is basically a petri dish, growing medium, and instructions for collecting mold spores. After the mold grows, you have no way of knowing what type of mold it is. To find out, you have to send it in to a lab to have it analyzed, for a costly, additional $40.00.
customer_reviews.author: Littlebit

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money-unreputable company.
customer_reviews.text: I received a product that expired three weeks ago, and was missing the mold growth medium. Don't waste your money - this was a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Michele J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: The service provided was useful.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to check our air circulation system in our house for mold and the kit was easy to use, just follow the simple instructions,. The testing lab was prompt in testing and returning the results. I would certainly recommend this testing kit.
customer_reviews.author: bilclv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and if they are accurate, no mold, yeh!
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Knapp

product_meta.title: Mold Armor FG500 Do It Yourself Mold Test Kit, Grey Air Quality Monitor and Mold Detector 1 Pack
product_meta.description:
MOLD ARMOR Do It Yourself Mold Test Kit will safely and easily test for the presence of inside or outside mold with results within 48 hours. This convenient home kit also serves as an air quality monitor and includes three testing methods: Indoor Air Quality Test Method, Air Conditioning & Heating Sample Method, and a Surface Sampling Testing Method when visible mold is present. This air quality test kit can also be used to detect unseen mold in the home. Each kit contains a petri dish, swab, and mold growth medium. An option for mail-in lab analysis to determine the mold type is available. While the MOLD ARMOR Do It Yourself Test Kit can be an important part of protecting your family against mold, many factors contribute to any test's effectiveness. The mold test kit can only detect airborne or surface mold spores, depending on test method, that are present in the area during testing. If symptoms of mold exposure persist, consult a certified mold specialist. Follow directions carefully and keep out of reach of children

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
